price: [Muusaanis] ni jedhe: “Yeroo san wallaaltota irraa ta’een ishee hojjadhe.
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
